objectives: Critically evaluate scholarly perspectives on symbolic interactionism

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to symbolic interactionism
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to symbolic interactionism

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about symbolic interactionism
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about symbolic interactionism
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about symbolic interactionism

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Quiet space with good acoustics and audio equipment

warm_up.description: Students listen to audio about symbolic interactionism and share reactions

main_activities.description: Students receive information about symbolic interactionism through auditory modality
Students practice language related to symbolic interactionism using auditory approach
Students produce original content about symbolic interactionism demonstrating advanced thinking

discussion_prompts: What are the implications of symbolic interactionism for society?
How would you design a better approach to symbolic interactionism?
What criteria would you use to evaluate symbolic interactionism?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for symbolic interactionism
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to symbolic interactionism

homework_options.required: Core assignment at advanced level using auditory approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about symbolic interactionism
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
